Plot: In this sequel, George Banks deals not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.
Title: Father of the Bride Part II
Writer: Albert Hackett (screenplay), Frances Goodrich (screenplay), Nancy Meyers (screenplay), Charles Shyer (screenplay)
Actors: Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, Martin Short, Kimberly Williams-Paisley
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
